pr_title: Optimize complicated if-else in routing table.

timeline.bodyText: Maybe just remove this condition as it's obviously always false and keep the rest the same (maybe also inline delta like we have in the "add" case). Seems to me that makes the logic easiest to digest if we want to change it?
timeline.author: original-brownbear

replies.bodyText: @original-brownbear Thanks for checking, I think we could pre-compute the delta and seperate the add and remove operation. Please help to review the update.
replies.author: howardhuanghua

replies.bodyText: I'm with @original-brownbear here, using Math.abs(expr) and then branching on the sign of expr looks weird to me. Let's avoid the use of Math#abs (and therefore the super-broad @SuppressForbidden annotation).
replies.author: DaveCTurner

replies.bodyText: OK. I removed abs method. Thank you @DaveCTurner .
replies.author: howardhuanghua

timeline.message: optimize complicated if-else in routing table
precompute delta and distinguish add and remove
